name: .DMN
summary: Learn about .DMN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open DMN files with various graphical modeling tools, such as Camunda Modeler, Red Hat Business Central, and Drools Workbench. To open a DMN file with Camunda Modeler, select File â†’ Open File.
Since DMN files store information in the XML standard, you can also open DMN files with any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or Microsoft Visual Studio Code.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dmn file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.1
images.caption: DMN file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.1
